statements: SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, city, postal_code FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT state, COUNT(*) as 'location_count' FROM locations GROUP BY state;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT location_id, city, postal_code FROM locations WHERE state = 'NY' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE postal_code LIKE '%5%' AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'CA' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT street_address, city, state, country FROM locations WHERE city <> 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender, city FROM customer_profiles JOIN locations ON customer_profiles.location_id = locations.location_id
SELECT name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location_id = 1
SELECT name, city, country FROM customer_profiles JOIN locations ON customer_profiles.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE age < 40
SELECT customer_id, name, age, region FROM customer_profiles JOIN locations ON customer_profiles.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC, gender DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, country FROM customer_profiles JOIN locations ON customer_profiles.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE country='USA'
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender='Female' AND location_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT customer_id, name, city FROM customer_profiles JOIN locations ON customer_profiles.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE region='West' OR region='South'
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age < 25 AND location_id != 4 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM Customers WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA');
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_content FROM Advertisements WHERE targeting_criteria LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT ad_title as Title, ad_content as Content FROM Advertisements ORDER BY ad_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT city, state, country FROM Locations WHERE state='California';
SELECT ad_title, ad_content FROM Advertisements WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ad_title, targeting_criteria FROM Advertisements ORDER BY ad_title ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE state='CA';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, state, country FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN Locations ON CustomerProfiles.location_id = Locations.location_id;

SELECT customer_name, location_name FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN CustomerLocationMapping ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = CustomerLocationMapping.customer_id JOIN Locations ON CustomerLocationMapping.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 4;

SELECT cp.customer_name, l.location_name, ac.campaign_name FROM CustomerProfiles cp JOIN CustomerLocationMapping clm ON cp.customer_id = clm.customer_id JOIN Locations l ON clm.location_id = l.location_id JOIN AdCampaigns ac ON clm.location_id = cp.location_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_id = 3;
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, location_id FROM customer_locations WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_content FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'discount';
SELECT customers.first_name, locations.city, locations.state FROM customers INNER JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id;

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, locations.city, locations.country FROM customers INNER JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE customers.location_id = 3;
